article_node.title: Number of Germans Owning Stocks Soars 44% in Last Decade
article_node.summary: Germany is witnessing a shift in retail investment, with the DAX index up 20% year to date, attracting around 3 million new investors in the past three years. Concerns about the pension system's sustainability are driving individuals to seek safer investment options like ETFs. This change in attitude is also influenced by social media, which is reaching younger audiences and encouraging a more proactive approach to investing.
